description: Ms. composite codex. Title from leaf 3a. Origin: Text 5, Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1042 H [May 1633] (leaf 32b). Text 7, Jumādá II 1064 H [April-May 1654] (leaf 96b). Text 8, Rabī II 1064 H [February-March 1654] (leaf 128a). Text 6 likely completed the same year as texts 7-8. Remaining texts likely 17th century.
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite ritual and doctrine.
contents: 2. leaves 3b-10b: Risālah fī bayān ḥaqīqat al-ṣawm / Ḥasan ʻAlī.
5. leaves 19b-32b: al-Ithnā ʻasharīyah al-ṣawmīyah / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
6. leaves 35b-74b: Risālah dar wujūb ʻaynī namāz Jumʻah / Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Muʼmin al-Sabzawārī.
7. leaves 75b-96b: Risālah dar maʻrifat-i mavāqīt-i layl va nahār / Humām al-Ṭabīb.
8. leaves 97b-128a: Kitāb Nahj al-mustarshidīn fī uṣūl al-dīn / Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
extent: 129 leaves : paper ; 196 x 104 (136-145 x 55-67) mm bound to 197 x 107 mm
provenance: On leaf 3a, two owners' stamps, an owner's note, and stamp of the Kitābkhānah-i Majd al-Dīn.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
